YMCA Membership Campaign

With the YMCA of the USA updating their brand, they need a new membership campaign. There were a total of three concepts produced for the campaign. Each concept consisted of a poster, direct mail post-card, and a local ad that could be placed in local newspapers.

Working with Keith Berr Productions , this campaign resulted in a five day photoshoot over 10,000 images. I was able to lead, direct, and organize over 20 different models.
